Articles.Content:
Join the fray of nations at the birth of a Kerbin-wide space race. Expand upwards with new technologies or outwards through militaristic means, even start a world war by pulling the right diplomatic strings.

![3hcHc3O.png](http://i.imgur.com/3hcHc3O.png)

[Seize your nationhood](http://kerbalnation.lefora.com//)

3 important things to remember.

1- Don't let personal feelings interfere.

2- Subjugation isn't a one way street but it's a 45 degree incline on the way out.

3- Read the rules thoroughly. 

Please keep the roleplay within the linked forum.

We have gotten permission in case this was in any way disallowed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-27T00:31:42Z" title="12/27/2015 12:31  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 27, 2015</time> by Spartwo**

Lots of Communism on Kerbin... 

I wouldn't think any Kerbals would be all that violent, either...

> 
> Lots of Communism on Kerbin...

The policy of containment went very badly...

> 
> Lots of Communism on Kerbin... 
> I wouldn't think any Kerbals would be all that violent, either...

o,0 cause kerbals are perfectly harmless. They would never make anything that blows up.

> 
> o,0 cause kerbals are perfectly harmless. They would never make anything that blows up.

It's not that they don't blow stuff up. It's that they don't appear to be violent with their splodey things.
Seems interesting. But I think the Social Union of Rimia is happy in its alternate universe where there are no imperialistic threats. I might join if I can.
Are we finally allowing BD armory?

I'm really tempted to join the tekkian foundation and speak in a fake British/Australian accent... or maybe one of the communist nations and speak in a terrible thick Russian accent... bah!

I'm in a dilemma though. The way I build crafts makes me think Russian in design and so if I have a leniency to building Russian shaped craft I should probably join a similar to Russian nation.

Do these craft seem more Russian, or more American to you o-O?

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/QIDnz)

Hello, I have given permission for this thread to go live, and will be watching it.

Remember that roleplaying on this forum is strictly forbidden, so keep it only on the forum the OP links to.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Does every nation have a member, or are there nations with no one in them yet?

> 
> Hello, I have given permission for this thread to go live, and will be watching it.
> Remember that roleplaying on this forum is strictly forbidden, so keep it only on the forum the OP links to.
> 
> ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I will do ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-05T20:25:55Z" title="04/05/2015 08:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 5, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

> 
> Does every nation have a member, or are there nations with no one in them yet?
> I will do ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

All nations do have a leader with the exception of one but there can be multiple leaders in a nation and the larger nations have substates which can be taken control of under varying terms depending on the leader and areas.

Also, a nation called the SMC (a huge chunk of land) will be up for grabs soon, since I made them into an ottoman empire. If you want to join, you should do it now.

And please remain respectful when interacting with other nations. It helps prevent any type of violent incident.

Well if there isn't a mongrel war loving nation yet (that the majority of flame would be pointed at), I'd volunteer. o/

> 
> Also, a nation called the SMC (a huge chunk of land) will be up for grabs soon, since I made them into an ottoman empire. If you want to join, you should do it now.
> And please remain respectful when interacting with other nations. It helps prevent any type of violent incident.

Wait are you giving up the whole nation, or some of it?
